name: Trace - Constellation
description:
In this game, you need to guide some Out of Control space ships around some space stations. See how long you can keep them from crashing into each other!

Controls!

Use the number keys to change the paths between stations.

e.g: Pressing 1 then 2 sets the path from 1 to 2 so any spaceships that touch 1 will head to 2. (good luck!)

Made by:

Christian "Funky Boy" Spencer - design and coding.

Koby "KWAB" Wise - design/coding and audio.

Carissa "murfuss" S - art.

Made for Game Maker's ToolKit 2020 game jam!
